entry.title: Monupco 1.2 Release Announcement
entry.content:
Today Monupco is pleased to announce version 1.2 of our updates monitoring service. Monupco provides user friendly interface to monitor available updates for your cloud applications and information about different package versions.

This release adds support for NodeJS packages. We've aready imported 1000 of the most dependent upon packages and started to process updates. Monupco has already produced detailed information for 60+ advisories.

Client side registration tool for NodeJS applications hosted at dotCloud has been added as well. It is contributed and maintained by Svetlozar Argirov. For more information see the install page.

Small improvements to the web interface were made:

  • Added pagination to the advisories and application details pages;
  • Added buttons to show only packages which need updates in application details page;
  • Added buttons to filter applications by status.

In the next weeks we're looking to enable support for Ruby, PHP, Perl and Java and extend client side tools to more vendors. Stay tuned if you don't want to miss the announcement.

entry.title: Monupco 1.1 Release Announcement
entry.content:
Today Monupco is pleased to announce the general availability of our updates monitoring service. Monupco provides user friendly interface to monitor available updates for your cloud applications and information about different package versions.

This is an alpha release for early adopters. Currently we support registration of Python applications hosted on Red Hat's OpenShift Express platform. Client side tools and installation information can be found at our GitHub page.

Monupco itself is developed in the cloud, for the cloud. We're working to support additional cloud vendors and more programming languages. Your feedback is valuable to us! We welcome your feature requests on Twitter and GitHub.

Monupco will remain free of charge until it reaches production-ready quality, when subscription plans will be announced. A gratis period and/or bonus credits will be made available to all early birds at that time.

We provide simplified registration and log in into our management console using credentials from popular social networking providers.
